name: Guilloche
summary: Guilloche creates Guilloche patterns in a UIView.
description: Guilloche creates [Guilloch√© Patterns](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Guilloch%C3%A9) in UIViews. It's based heavily on [Tom Beddard](http://www.subblue.com/about)'s AS3 source code and [Guilloche Pattern Generator](http://www.subblue.com/projects/guilloche). We use it to generate unique backs for each deck of cards.
